鷐字的基本解释

鷐
chén
〔鷐风〕即“
鸇”，鹰类猛禽。亦作“晨风”。

鷐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chén］
［《廣韻》植鄰切，平直，禪。］
见“鷐風”。

鷐字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷐； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1498第22
【唐韻】植鄰切【集韻】丞眞切，?音辰。【玉篇】鷐風，鸇也。○按《詩·秦風》鴥彼晨風，不从鳥。

鷐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鷐字的起名意思

鹰类猛禽，如鷐风，亦作“晨风”。

鷐
Basic explanation of words
鷐
chén
〔鷐风〕It means "
"Flying bird", eagle raptor. Also known as "morning breeze."
鷐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chén］
["Guangyun" planting neighbors cut, straight, Zen. ]
See "Feng Feng".
鷐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷐; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1498 Page 22
[Tang Yun] Zhi Lin cut [Ji Yun] Cheng Su cut,? Yin Chen. [Jade articles] The wind, the swan. ○According to "Poetry·Qin Feng", the morning breeze does not follow the bird.

鷐
Name meaning
The eagle raptor, such as the wind, is also known as the "morning breeze."
